Writer: Jeffrey Hatcher (screenplay), Kimberly Simi (screenplay), Kimberly Simi (story), Michael Cristofer (story)
Title: Casanova
Actors: Heath Ledger, Sienna Miller, Jeremy Irons, Oliver Platt
Plot: The fabled romantic Giacomo Casanova, after failing to win the affection of the Venetian woman Francesca Bruni, strives to discover the real meaning of love.
